publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4368 George Lyon: Local Electoral Administration and Registration Services (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Local Electoral Administration and Registration Services (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Mr Tom McCabe*

S2M-4368 George Lyon: Local Electoral Administration and Registration Services (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Local Electoral Administration and Registration Services (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Mr Tom McCabe

S2M-4368 George Lyon: Local Electoral Administration and Registration Services (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Local Electoral Administration and Registration Services (Scotland) Bill be passed. Supported by: Mr Tom McCabe Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
